column2: You've heard from couriers the ways of cheating. Take it a step further.
You've heard from courtiers the ways of cheating. Sounds fun.
You've heard from courtiers the ways of cheating. Sounds fun, but let's not go too far.

After accumulating a mass of gold and prestige, you decide that cheating would be the best. Right? I mean, you've already done it with the weaker version, why not become the full potential of your powers?

After accumulating a mass of gold and prestige, you decide that cheating would be the best. Right? I mean, you've already done it with the weaker version, why not become the full potential of your powers?
Using my cheatery, I can conjure up some gold.
Using my cheatery, I can conjure up some Piety.
Using my cheatery, I can conjure up some Prestige.
Using my extensive influence and power, I can convince my landed vassals to repeal ownership of their lands.
Using my extensive influence and power, I can convince local populaces to convert to the one and true faith.
Using my extensive influence and power, I can convince local populaces to assimilate into my culture.
After you conquer those provinces, you get those pesky modifiers on administration. Remove them.
You said what about my mum?
We will search every corner of the realm to find her!
We will search every corner of the realm to find her!
